committees.committee: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to authorize the President of the United States to present, on behalf of the Congress, a specially struck gold medal to Ben Abruzzo, Maxie Anderson, and Larry Newman.

summary.text: Authorizes the President, on behalf of the Congress, to present a specially struck gold medal to the transatlantic balloonists, Ben Abruzzo, Maxie Anderson, and Larry Newman. Authorizes appropriations for such medal. Authorizes the Secretary of the Treasury to make bronze duplicates of such medal for public sale.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the President of the United States to present, on behalf of the Congress, a specially struck gold medal to Ben Abruzzo, Maxie Anderson, and Larry Newman.
